name: ULTIMATE HARDBASS DEFENCE
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Intel Core i3-530 or Intel Xeon E5430 or AMD Phenom II X4 3.0 Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750ti or AMD Radeon HD6970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 support Additional Notes: If the game works well on your hardware, weaker than this minimum requirements - please let us know at the community hub.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 or AMD FX-6000 series 3.0 Ghz+ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050ti or AMD Radeon R9 280X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 support
